kill_chain_stages.name: Reconnaissance
kill_chain_stages.description: Gathering information to plan future operations

kill_chain_stages.name: Weaponization
kill_chain_stages.description: Creating or preparing exploit code and payloads

kill_chain_stages.name: Delivery
kill_chain_stages.description: Transmitting the weapon to the target environment

kill_chain_stages.name: Exploitation
kill_chain_stages.description: Exploiting vulnerabilities to execute code on target system

kill_chain_stages.name: Installation
kill_chain_stages.description: Installing malware or maintaining access on the target system

kill_chain_stages.name: Command and Control
kill_chain_stages.description: Establishing command and control channel for remote manipulation

kill_chain_stages.name: Actions on Objectives
kill_chain_stages.description: Taking actions to achieve the intended objectives (data theft, destruction, etc.)
